item.description:
Singer/Songwriter/Guitarist Judy C with her all star folk rock band at
The Gathering
Sunday Jan 17th at 2PM
217 Essex St, Salem, MA 01970

World renown drummer Dave Mattacks who was an original member of the folkrock band Fairport Convention and who toured Jethro Tulll among many others. Bassist Richard Gates who performed with Suzanne Vega and Paul Cole among many others, and Gloucester area guitarist David Brown who toured with Billy Joel.

$10 donation appreciated $5 children
Refreshments
If there's a snow storm the show will be the following Sunday, check www.judyc.net for changes

Ask at the door to find Vicki or Mia.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the door to find Vicki or Mia

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Judy C with her all star band
